description: This file defines several UI placeholder components for a React application, including PlaceholderImage, EmptyState, and Skeleton, used for displaying placeholders in the user interface.

methods.name: PlaceholderImage
methods.description: Renders a rectangular placeholder for images with customizable label and styling.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Displays a generic empty state with an icon, title, and description, optionally including children elements.

methods.name: Skeleton
methods.description: Renders an animated loading skeleton bar.
